channel.title: How do i Change My ip and port in client and source
channel.description: hello how do i change my ip and port on the client. im new to this and i think this is y my brother or any one else cant get on

item.title: How do i Change My ip and port in client and source
item.dc:creator: @pkingpimpz pkingpimpz
item.description:
@pkingpimpz wrote:

ok it wasnt in gui it was in client.java n i changed it all n it now says error connecting to server, could it be my no-ip is not working?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i Change My ip and port in client and source

item.title: How do i Change My ip and port in client and source
item.dc:creator: @rofllewisrofl rofllewisrofl
item.description:
@rofllewisrofl wrote:

go to your clients GUI (if it has one) and search “localhost” “127.0.0.1” “IP”

Or what the last IP was, and change it to your new one. As for the port, the default is already set to 43594 in most cases.

Read full topic
